title: Jesse Finds a Crux
description: Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn clear out the docket on free refills, open mics (or is it open MIKES?), canoe weekends and what to do if your friend recommends a book he hasn't actually read.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
